s.name: Task Tracker
s.description: An app built with the React framework that tracks tasks, providing a form for adding tasks, buttons for deleting, and a reminder function.

t.name: Sudoku
t.description: Sudoku solver using CSP forward-tracking algorithms. Can solve most puzzles in 0.1 seconds.

u.name: Portfolio
u.description: A website made as a compilation of my experience, projects, and skills, hosted using my school's domain. You're looking it right now.

v.name: Railroad
v.description: A project exploring algorithms such as BFS, Bi-BFS, A*, Bi-A*, and Tri-A* to calculate the shortest train route through U.S. cities.

x.name: Jared.exe
x.description: A discord counting bot which implements order of operations, among other functions. Features include a daily leaderboard, channel settings, and help function.

y.name: Tag
y.description: A plugin for spigot Minecraft that starts a 5 minute game of tag with everyone in the current lobby.
